meanings.definition: A person employed to do various tasks in a house or hotel.
meanings.sent1: The housemen cleaned the rooms in the hotel every morning.
meanings.sent2: The housemen were responsible for maintaining the cleanliness of the entire house.
meanings.sent3: The housemen accidentally mixed up the guests' room keys, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The housemen were the unsung heroes of the hotel, silently ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The housemen's efficiency and attention to detail made the hotel sparkle with cleanliness.
